entities.name: nagini
entities.description: Nagini is Voldemort's snake, described as being targeted by Harry with his wand.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist, described as looking at Harry and considering him.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the protagonist, described as standing before Voldemort and being considered by him.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Harry's love interest, mentioned in his thoughts.

relationships.description: Harry targets Nagini with his wand.
